discussion.author: thery
discussion.comment:
maybe to make this PR less scary to review, it would be good to split it in 5 digestible chunks : 
algebra,  field,  fingroup,  solvable,  ssreflect

discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: I agree with @thery  that this PR is too monolithic.

discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: Splitting package-wise might not be the most relevant / easy thing to do. For instance, the changes in ssreflect are of quite different nature. But any way to make the reviewing more incremental would be great.

discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: This would allow to accept little controversial additions (e.g., `eisenstein`) rapidly. Other contributions (e.g., the `^^` notation for `map_poly`) might deserve a bit more discussion.

discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: Also, I offered offline to help with finalizing the PR, in particular with the documentation, but a few sketchy comments in the code would nonetheless be much appreciated.

discussion.author: amahboubi
discussion.comment: E.g., the intended usage of `dfwith`, the expected caveats of novel notations if any, etc.

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment: I have just reported a few comments that were made during today's meeting + alpha but maybe I should have addressed most of them myself directly. I'll try to do that a bit later.

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment: Compilation fails in `galois.v`. I am afraid I am missing something.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Maybe avoid the `do [suff ...] in p *` in favor of something more standard using `have`?

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Maybe give a readable name to the hypotheses introduced using `?`.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Check whether the `-` is really needed, it may reveal a bug.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Should be documented in the header.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment:
Should be documented in the header. Just copy-paste the documentation from MathComp-Analysis:
```
(*             dfwith f x == fun j => x if j = i, and f j otherwise           *)
(*                           given x : T i                                    *)
```

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Maybe this should not be merged.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: `setXn_dprod` is actually an admitted lemma. Remove?

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Need to be documented in the header.

review_discussion.author: affeldt-aist
review_discussion.comment: Is there a reason why it is a definition and not a lemma?
